phrs.translation: 颂扬, 赞美, 吹捧, 称颂
颂扬, 吹捧, 赞美

sentences.sentence: Doctors often extol the virtues of eating less fat.
sentences.translation: 医生常常宣扬少吃脂肪的好处。

sentences.sentence: We will extol your love more than wine.
sentences.translation: 我们要称赞你的爱情，胜似称赞美酒。

sentences.sentence: You are my God, and I give thanks to You; You are my God, I extol You.
sentences.translation: 你是我的神，我要称谢你。你是我的神，我要尊崇你。
